author: yongbinfeng
body:
#### PR description:

Backport DeepMET NanoAOD integration into CMSSW_10_6_X, such that it could be included in UL Nano. More description of DeepMET can be found in the orignal PR. (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/30291). Most of the changes in `PhysicsTools/PatAlgos/plugins/RecoMETExtractor.cc` come from the code-format checks. Also backport https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/30926/ to fix the break condition.

For the ultra legacy (`run2_miniAOD_devel`) DeepMETs will not be computed on the fly, but to be extracted from MiniAOD. For other eras DeepMETs will be computed on the fly and saved to Nano.

#### PR validation:

Check with different eras and work as expected. Also passed the `runTheMatrix.py` without errors.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/30291 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/30926/

@steggema @intrepid42
title: Add DeepMET into NanoAOD for UltraLegacy in 10_6_X (backport of 30291 and 30926)
